1.1.name: wordpress/social-publish
1.1.description:
This plugin allows interaction with social network when specific actions in blog happen. As we do new realease we'll add more features. It uses

Main Feature:

  • Publish on facebook dashborad using secret facebook mail that you can retrieve from http://www.facebook.com/mobile
  • Custom message to show
  • Option when publishing

FeedBacks and suggests are welcome
